memberdef.name: RUN_ANALYSES
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(AnalysisDataPointers& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ runAnalyses(result, #EXPERIMENT, *Dep::RunMC, \ *Dep::CAT(EXPERIMENT,AnalysisContainer), *Dep::SMEARED_EVENT_DEP, \ *Loop::iteration, Loop::wrapup); \ }
